trans-unit.source: Each player chooses a number of lands he or she controls equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.
trans-unit.target: Each player chooses a number of lands he or she controls equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. Players discard cards and sacrifice creatures the same way.

trans-unit.source: Cast CARDNAME only before the combat damage step.
trans-unit.target: Cast CARDNAME only before the combat damage step.

trans-unit.source: Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At the beginning of the end step, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.
trans-unit.target: Target creature gains trample and gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is its power. At the beginning of the end step, destroy that creature if it attacked this turn.

trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {1} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: Until end of turn, any time you could activate a mana ability, you may pay 1 life. If you do, add {1} to your mana pool.

trans-unit.resname: V09·4 | Gifts Ungiven | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.resname: V09·5 | Goblin Lackey | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals damage to a player, you may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Whenever CARDNAME deals damage to a player, you may put a Goblin permanent card from your hand onto the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: V09·6 | Kird Ape | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME gets +1/+2 as long as you control a Forest.

trans-unit.resname: V09·7 | Lotus Petal | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

trans-unit.resname: V09·8 | Mystical Tutor | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for an instant or sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

trans-unit.source: Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you discard a card, exile that card from your graveyard.

trans-unit.source: Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.
trans-unit.target: Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of your next end step.

trans-unit.resname: V09·13 | Strip Mine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
V09·13 | Strip Mine | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, sacrifice an artifact.

trans-unit.source: Search your library for an artifact card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for an artifact card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.source: As long as CARDNAME is untapped, each spell that would cost less than three mana to cast costs three mana to cast.
trans-unit.target: As long as CARDNAME is untapped, each spell that would cost less than three mana to cast costs three mana to cast.
